control_attributes.control_description: The organization conducts a supplier review prior to entering into a contractual agreement to acquire the information system, system component, or information system service.
control_attributes.Control_description: The organization establishes inter-organizational agreements and procedures with entities involved in the supply chain for the information system, system component, or information system service.

Control Statement: The organization conducts a supplier review prior to entering into a contractual agreement to acquire the information system, system component, or information system service.
